content: the swift ie pattern created by fleeting obsessions art co-authored by amazeingly handmade dress materials needed 800 - 1500 yards depending on size use size recommended for yarn samples of sizes used in images below yarn needle scissors size 4 yarn used in images but any size will do may change amount of row needed sewing needle and thread stitch markers stitch guide us terms chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch when st counts appear in parentheses repeat single_crochet single_crochet cluster/granny stitch 3 double_crochet in the same space or a granny stitch double_crochet double_crochet yarn used in image 1 blue dress peaches & cream cotton yarn size 4 colors white black ecru and oasis 6 5mm hook dress length 33 inches yarn used in image 2 green dress red heart colors navy & teal ombre i love this yarn colors white linen & peacock tails 6mm hook dress length disclaimer ©fleetingobsessionsart2023 all information and photos are the sole property of fleeting obsessions art and krista mccloud do not copy sell or redistribute this pattern in any way items made by this pattern made be sold as long as pattern credit is given to fleeting obsessions art via any of the hashtags or links below social media #fleetingobsessionsart #fleetingobsessionscrafts website https //fleetingobsessionsart squarespace com facebook fleeting obsessions | facebook tiktok @fleetingobsessionsart | tiktok instagram @fleetingobsessionsart pattern tested by michelle maze amazeingly handmade facebook amazeingly handmade or sassy head threads tiktok amazeingly handmade | tiktok instagram amazeingly handmade | instagram pattern notes please read all pattern notes - they are important and were included for specific assistance throughout the build if you have questions about the pattern please read through all notes first before submitting a request for assistance use a stitch marker to keep track of where your row start and end when working the neckline if you find that you missed a stitch in a cluster just move on friend this pattern is made in 2 panels that we will sew together you will then work the sleeves and stitch them to the dress body panel front and back coupon code at the end of the pattern front this pattern is designed to be make to your size - make a chain the length you want your dress but i will have some recommended stitch counts from the top center of your shoulder down for you based on what i used please note that if remember that it will get slightly longer when you you are using smaller yarn or a different hook then add your next few row due to the weight of the your results may vary yarn your starting chain must be a your starting chain must be a multiple of 3 plus 2 stitches multiple of 3 plus 2 stitches below is an image to show the different blue dress chain 63 6 5 mm hook measurements you will need green dress chain 90 6 0 mm hook - row 1 along your chain double_crochet in the third
